pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Saturday, November 12, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Phnom Penh, Cambodia

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

Phnom Penh International Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Cambodia, Hun Sen.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

6:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the ASEAN-Canada Commemorative Summit.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage of opening remarks and host broadcaster coverage

7:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Vietnam, Pham Minh Chinh.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a gala dinner given by the Prime Minister of Cambodia, Hun Sen.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcaster coverage of official arrivals
